item.title: Scarcity of quality
item.description: Lately I concentrated my efforts on optimizing or descovering new mental problem solving tools. Curently I am focusing on philosophy(mainly descriptive), logic(the main tool) and mathematics(a more pragmatic branch of logic that helps me in everyday life). I feel that the sharper my tools will be, the more I could spot logical fallacies or inconsistencies, which in turn will make me lose appreciation in everyday events. If I spot multiple inconsistencies in a movie’s script, although it was highly entertaining, the movie is bad.

item.title: Total immersion
item.description: Concerning learning a particular subject(sewing, a new language, rope skipping, etc) you MUST immerse yourself fully in the subject’s environment. If you want to learn to swim: take swimming classes mentally visualise the techniques watch swimming competitions practice breathing patterns when taking a bath watch youtube tutorials Of je want een ding leren, moet je omring jezelf met delen van die ding’s milieu.
